number-display.tooltip: normal: display window number, smart: display window number if more than one window, none: don't display number, all: display window number for favorites too

title-display.tooltip: focused: show focused window title, title: display the window title, app: diplay app name, none: don't display anything

group-apps.tooltip: Group each app's set of windows.

show-alerts.tooltip: If enabled, notifications and alerts will appear.

show-pinned.tooltip: Controls whether or not the pinned apps appear in the panel if they are not open.

system-favorites.description: Use system favorites for pinned apps
system-favorites.tooltip: Controls whether or not pinned apps consist of the system favorites list.

pinOnDrag.description: Pin apps when dragged to a new position
pinOnDrag.tooltip: Pin apps when dragged to a new position

middle-click-action.description: Middle clicking app buttons creates new app instances
middle-click-action.tooltip: Determines the behavior of middle mouse button clicks on app buttons. Setting this to false will close the last focused window from the app group on middle click.

list-monitor-windows.description: Only list windows from the monitor displaying this instance
list-monitor-windows.tooltip: This option will only come into effect for monitors displaying an ITM instance.

cycleMenusHotkey.description: Global hotkey for cycling through thumbnail menus
cycleMenusHotkey.tooltip: This allows you to cycle through the menus without activating a window.

show-apps-order-hotkey.description: Global hotkey to show the order of apps
show-apps-order-hotkey.tooltip: When triggered, the window count label will be replaced with its order in the app list temporarily.

show-apps-order-timeout.description: Duration of the apps order display on hotkey press
show-apps-order-timeout.tooltip: Determines the duration the window count labels are replaced with the app's order number.

enable-app-button-width.description: Use a custom width for app buttons
enable-app-button-width.tooltip: When disabled, the app button width is determined by the panel height.

app-button-width.tooltip: Controls the width of the application button. This option only works for horizontal panels.

thumbnail-timeout.tooltip: Controls how quickly an app's set of window thumbnails will fade out when the mouse leaves the app button.

thumbnail-size.tooltip: Controls the size of the thumbnails.

thumbnail-close-button-size.tooltip: Controls how large the thumbnail close button is.

thumbnail-padding.tooltip: Controls how much space will be around the window preview thumbnails.

show-thumbnails.tooltip: Show window thumbnails when hovering over an app button.

animate-thumbnails.tooltip: If enabled, thumbnails will animate when appearing and disappearing.

vertical-thumbnails.tooltip: If enabled, thumbnails will stack vertically.

sort-thumbnails.description: Sort windows for each app by last focused
sort-thumbnails.tooltip: Controls whether the order windows appear for an app is by last focused, or the order they were opened.

highlight-last-focused-thumbnail.description: Highlight the last focused window within an app group
highlight-last-focused-thumbnail.tooltip: When enabled, the last window that was interacted with will be indicated.

onclick-thumbnails.tooltip: Open the thumbnails on click if there is more than one window open.

include-all-windows.tooltip: Controls whether or not thumbnails for smalller child windows, such as exit confirmations and file dialogues will be included in the thumbnail list.

show-recent.tooltip: Controls whether recent items will appear in the context menu.

menuItemType.tooltip: Determines whether menu item icons are symbolic, non-symbolic, or not shown.

firefox-menu.tooltip: Most Visited: show the sites you visit most, Recent History: display the the last pages you visited, Bookmarks: show your favorite bookmarks.

autostart-menu-item.tooltip: Shows the autostart toggle option in an app's context menu.

monitor-move-all-windows.description: Apply the monitor move option to all windows
monitor-move-all-windows.tooltip: When clicking "Move to monitor" in the context menu, this option will move all of an app's windows instead of just the last focused window from the app.

enable-hover-peek.tooltip: Controls whether or not windows display when hovered over.

hover-peek-time.tooltip: Controls how quickly a window will fade on hover.

hover-peek-opacity.tooltip: Opacity of the windows on hover.

show-active.tooltip: Active app styling will indicate if an app is active.

icon-spacing.tooltip: Controls how much space is between the icons.

icon-padding.tooltip: Controls how much horizontal padding is inside the app buttons. Padding is only applied to instances of this applet on horizontal panels.

enable-iconSize.tooltip: Adjust icon size independent of Cinnamon's panel scaling.

hoverPseudoClass.tooltip: Overrides the pseudo class for app buttons on hover.

focusPseudoClass.tooltip: Overrides the pseudo class for app button on focus.

activePseudoClass.tooltip: Overrides the pseudo class for app buttons when they are active.
